params.amountRequested: The amount of reward tokens to claim. Claims entire reward amount if set to 0.
params.rewardToken: The token being distributed as a reward
params.to: The address where claimed rewards will be sent to

returns.reward: The amount of reward tokens claimed

params._maxIncentiveDuration: the max amount of seconds into the future the incentive startTime can be set
params._maxIncentiveStartLeadTime: the max duration of an incentive in seconds
params._nonfungiblePositionManager: the NFT position manager contract address

params.key: Details of the incentive to create
params.reward: The amount of reward tokens to be distributed

params.key: Details of the incentive to end

returns.refund: The remaining reward tokens when the incentive is ended

returns.reward: The reward accrued to the NFT for the given incentive thus far

multicall(bytes[]).details: The `msg.value` should not be trusted for any method callable from multicall.

params.data: The encoded function data for each of the calls to make to this contract

returns.results: The results from each of the calls passed in via data

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: Whenever an {IERC721} `tokenId` token is transferred to this contract via {IERC721-safeTransferFrom} by `operator` from `from`, this function is called. It must return its Solidity selector to confirm the token transfer. If any other value is returned or the interface is not implemented by the recipient, the transfer will be reverted. The selector can be obtained in Solidity with `IERC721.onERC721Received.selector`.

params.key: The key of the incentive for which to stake the NFT
params.tokenId: The ID of the token to stake

params.incentiveId: The ID of the incentive for which the token is staked
params.tokenId: The ID of the staked token

returns.liquidity: The amount of liquidity in the NFT as of the last time the rewards were computed

params.to: The new owner of the deposit
params.tokenId: The ID of the token (and the deposit) to transfer

params.key: The key of the incentive for which to unstake the NFT
params.tokenId: The ID of the token to unstake

params.data: An optional data array that will be passed along to the `to` address via the NFT safeTransferFrom
params.to: The address where the LP token will be sent
params.tokenId: The unique identifier of an Uniswap V3 LP token

incentives.details: bytes32 refers to the return value of IncentiveId.compute

params.owner: The owner for which the rewards owed are checked
params.rewardToken: The token for which to check rewards

rewards.return: rewardsOwed The amount of the reward token claimable by the owner

DepositTransferred(uint256,address,addre.notice: Emitted when ownership of a deposit changes

IncentiveCreated(address,address,uint256.notice: Event emitted when a liquidity mining incentive has been created

IncentiveEnded(bytes32,uint256).notice: Event that can be emitted when a liquidity mining incentive has ended

RewardClaimed(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when a reward token has been claimed

TokenStaked(uint256,bytes32,uint128).notice: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been staked

TokenUnstaked(uint256,bytes32).notice: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked

claimReward(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers `amountRequested` of accrued `rewardToken` rewards from the contract to the recipient `to`

createIncentive((address,address,uint256.notice: Creates a new liquidity mining incentive program

endIncentive((address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Ends an incentive after the incentive end time has passed and all stakes have been withdrawn

getRewardInfo((address,address,uint256,u.notice: Calculates the reward amount that will be received for the given stake

maxIncentiveDuration().notice: The max duration of an incentive in seconds

maxIncentiveStartLeadTime().notice: The max amount of seconds into the future the incentive startTime can be set

multicall(bytes[]).notice: Call multiple functions in the current contract and return the data from all of them if they all succeed

nonfungiblePositionManager().notice: The nonfungible position manager with which this staking contract is compatible

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: Upon receiving a Uniswap V3 ERC721, creates the token deposit setting owner to `from`. Also stakes token in one or more incentives if properly formatted `data` has a length > 0.

rewards(address,address).notice: Returns amounts of reward tokens owed to a given address according to the last time all stakes were updated

stakeToken((address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Stakes a Uniswap V3 LP token

stakes(uint256,bytes32).notice: Returns information about a staked liquidity NFT

transferDeposit(uint256,address).notice: Transfers ownership of a deposit from the sender to the given recipient

unstakeToken((address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Unstakes a Uniswap V3 LP token

withdrawToken(uint256,address,bytes).notice: Withdraws a Uniswap V3 LP token `tokenId` from this contract to the recipient `to`
